title: Ingestion service deployable
description:
We want to have an artifact that can be deployed into the environment using our standards (k8s, logging, versioned, CI, etc).

This service should fulfil the following functional requirements:

* data is ingested for consumption in IE (that means, after ingesting it, the index can be promoted)
* data is enriched with the `_rnd` metadata field so that we can use sampling
* index is created with the naming convention of `profiles_client_`
* there is a published contract that consumers of this service can use
